text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our Phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
He is Hot. He is Happening. Say Hello to our Hero, Mr. H!
Hi, hello, hey! Ha ha ha will save the day.
Hi, hello, hey! Ha ha ha will save the day.
He can help, he is handy, He is handsome, he is dandy.
He can help, he is handy, He is handsome, he is dandy.
I am so happy to be here. Ha ha is what I want to hear
So, hold your hats & hum with me, Ha ha ha is easy as can be
HA HA HA HA!
When Santa goes ho ho ho
Remember it begins with a ha ha ha
Haa haa, hee hee, ho ho, hee haw.
Mr H is a huge draw.
Ha ha ha ha hoola hoop
I play in a group
And this Ha ha ha ha Horn
I play it on my own

Mr. H has a ha ha Hen 
She counts her eggs, one to ten

His ha ha hamster lives in a tub
And really loves a tummy rub.

Then there is my ha ha ha hare,
Hopping round in the open air.

That’s my Ha ha ha horse eating hay,
Oh he loves to gallop all day.

Hey, what’s that up in the sky?
A ha ha hawk, eyeing my pie?

Ah no! a ha ha helicopter it is.
Let’s send the pilot a flying kiss.

If ha ha hungry is what you feel
How about a hotdog for your meal

Or a juicy piece of ham
With some toast, butter, yummy jam.

Ha ha hot cross buns for  a penny,
Or two a penny, you can eat as many.

On a wall sat ha ha Humpty Dumpty,
Whose fall made him very grumpy.

I love to give a warm ha ha hug
Its makes me feel cozy and snug.

That's a ha ha habit I’ll never break.
With all the friends I forever make.

Ha ha ha Hooray, hooray
Mr H has shown the way.

Ha ha ha he is the best
Judges, ha ha has he passed the test

Heart warming! Helpful! Happening!
A Hit!  He’s Hip!
Thank you Mr.H, and you hearty Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then, Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
